root.name: Super Nazo Puyo: Rulue no Roux
root.description: OverviewSuper Nazo Puyo: Rulue no Roux (sometimes transliterated as Ruruu no Ruu) is the fourth entry of the Nazo Puyo series to be released on dedicated gaming platforms. Like other Nazo Puyo games, Rulue no Roux removes Puyo Puyo's competitive gameplay, instead placing emphasis on the completion of several challenges. The game features an RPG-like quest akin to its immediate predecessor Arle no Roux, and includes a remake of that game in addition to a new quest that stars Arle's rival Rulue.
